Blood sample collect right 2 hour meal NTBI analysis . NTBI concentration meal consumption compare .
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy male volunteer ( 21 45 year old ) Creactive protein ( CRP ) < 5 mg/L Blood donation significant blood loss ( e.g . surgery ) within past 4 month Regular intake iron nutrient supplement within past 4 month Regular intake medication except oral contraceptive Acute recent inflammatory infectious symptom Chronic gastrointestinal disorder metabolic disease Smoking Coeliac disease glutenrelated disorder Iron deficiency anemia ( Hb < 14 g/dL male ) serum ferritin concentration < 30 ng/mL ) Noniron deficiency anemia ( serum ferritin concentration within normal range ( 30 300 ng/mL male ) low hemoglobin ( < 14 g/dL male ) Iron overload condition ( serum ferritin concentration > 300 ng/mL male ) Known hereditary disorder iron metabolism
